Question.Subject: how will amazon send me my prepaid phone card?
Question.Content: by email or mail? if its by mail is there any way i can make them send the code through email?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
They will most likely send it to you through mail,
I know that email is much more convenient, but amazon only likes to send receipts and "requests for feedback" emails, I have never heard of anyone receiving pre paid codes through email from amazon, only coupon codes and such.
